comment.body:
Kind of new to this.

I myself don't have many ebooks but if you searched 'torrentz.eu' on normal-net with the phrase 'new ebook packs' there are close to a few 100GBs of ebooks neatly packed by yearly/monthly basis.

Also there's 'libgen.io' on normal-net which also has some millions of ebooks.If you were looking for sources to get ebooks, I mean.
